boardgame.name: The Red Dragon Inn 5
The Red Dragon Inn 5: The Character Trove
boardgame.description: The Red Dragon Inn 5: The Character Trove is a fast-paced, light-hearted card game for two or more players. You and your increasingly mighty party of adventuring companions have spent all day slogging through the dungeon, killing monsters and taking their stuff. Now you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re back in town, healed up, cleaned up, and ready to party at the Red Dragon Inn. Drink, gamble, and roughhouse with your friends. But don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t forget to keep an eye on your gold. If you run out, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll have to spend the night in the stables. Oh_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip; and try not to get too beaten up or too drunk. If you black out, your friends will continue the party without you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip; after they loot your body for gold, of course! The last conscious adventurer with gold wins the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Red Dragon Inn 5: The Character Trove is a standalone game for 2-4 players. It expands on _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The Red Dragon Inn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; family of box sets and single-character expansions called Allies. You can mix and match characters from any of these sets, letting you build the party composition of your choice! Each of the box sets includes four unique characters, a drink deck, gold pieces, and all the parts for 2-4 players to play right out of the box. Each of the Allies expansions includes a character deck as well as gold pieces and bits so you can add another character to a box set (thus making a 2-4 player collection playable by 2-5 players)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Sera the Fleetfooted: Sera is a stealthy rogue whose speed and agility allow her to take down roomfuls of bad guys before they even know what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s happening. The dungeon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s beefiest monsters are no match for her flying daggers! She didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t get so skilled by slacking off, though. Even while she_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s partying, she continues training to make sure she_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s always at the top of her game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Good: She hones her skills by sparring with her friends._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Bad: Sometimes she does this without warning them first_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Lizwick the Collector: Lizwick is a consummate problem solver with an unrivaled collection of gear. Her wondrous Bag of Holding contains rare and peculiar items of all descriptions. She is always on the lookout for the next amazing whatchamacallit to add to her collection. Lizwick has gotten The Party out of many a jam with the clever application of the wrong tool at the right time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Good: Lizwick_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s collection is the envy of academies, guilds and hoarders alike!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Bad: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip;and they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;d like their stuff back._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Joran the Trickster: Joran_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s penchant for pranks earned him a student _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;sabbatical_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; from the Mage_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Collegium. Fortunately, Zot saw some potential in the boy, and decided to take him adventuring for some valuable field experience. The young mage_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s humor has proven to be mostly harmless to his new friends. He puts his clever brain to good use by pulling fast ones on the bad guys._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Good: Joran_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s talent for misdirection makes him the perfect weapon against enemy spell-casters._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Bad: It also makes him the perfect weapon against his friends_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; gold, their sobriety, their patience_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Zakhan the Drunken Master: Zakhan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s father is a solemn elven noble and a guru of meditative martial combat techniques. His mother was a rowdy barbarian warchief with a penchant for throwing wild parties. This unique heritage has allowed Zakhan to hone a seemingly reckless hybrid fighting style of his own. His opponents who underestimate his _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;drunken_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; martial arts do so at their own peril!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Good: Zakhan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s drunken fighting techniques make him a formidable foe._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Bad: Sometimes he_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s actually just drunk._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But wait, there's more! The Red Dragon Inn 5: The Character Trove is also a massive storage solution for all previous sets (with room for more). You get a massive storage box plus dividers, new play mats for all previously released characters, updated tokens and more! Check it out:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 6 Unique Decks (4 40-card Character Decks, 1 18-card Item Deck, 1 30-card Drink Deck)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 29 Character-specific Player Mats (with replacements for all previous sets!)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 35 Cardboard Deck Dividers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 Cardboard Chi Marker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 4 Glass Fortitude Markers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 4 Glass Alcohol Content Markers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 9 Remastered Cardboard Fortitude Markers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 9 Remastered Cardboard Alcohol Content Markers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 55 Remastered Gold Coin Tokens_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 9 New Platinum Coin Tokens_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 10 Foam Spacer Blocks_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 Cloth Drawstring Bags_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Ziptop Baggies_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rules for playing The Red Dragon Inn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This sale has been auto-generated for the auction: [geekurl=/geeklist/200164/item/4312678#4312678]Item for Geeklist _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Quick BOX O_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; GAMES #3 auction (3 BOXES!) - Ends December 9th between 8PM-10PM CST - US ONLY/local pickup is fine_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; [/geekurl] Please do not purchase if you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t win this auction.

SlugFest Games (SFG019) Four new heroes join in the party at The Red Dragon Inn. Will Joran_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tricks, Lizwick_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s equipment, Sera_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s training or Zakhan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s drunken antics survive the night? Buy a round and find out! The Red Dragon Inn: 5 - The Character Trove is a stand-alone game that expands on The Red Dragon Inn series of games. In addition to new characters, RDI5 comes in a greatly expanded box, new tokens and bits with updated graphics and a replacement player mat for each previously released character. RDI5 will hold everything released so far, and have room to grow!
Fully sleeved Kickstarter Edition Includes RDI 1, RDI 2, Pooky, Wrench, Halden, and Zariah Includes metal coins for up to 6 players.

Includes RDI 1 and 2 in the RDI5 box! Plus RDI3 new in shrink in its own box! The RDI5 box has some edge wear, bumping to corners. Game looks barely played. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re located in the states of ME, NH, VT, MA, RI, CT, NY, PA, NJ, DE or MD the shipping costs should be quite reasonable. Local delivery in the southern NH region is possible. The Nashua, NH and at times Portland, ME areas are all easily doable.
Includes Red Dragon Inn 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5. PLUS 4 allies - Cormac, Erin, Pooky and Natyli. All contained inside RDI 5 box. No expansion boxes included.
